title: [Bug]: Screen Share not working
body:
### Can you reproduce this bug in the website/PWA?

Yes

### Describe the bug

ScreenShare not work

### What package are you using?

deb

### Version

1.12.7

### Reproduction steps

```markdown
1.In call
2.Share
3.Screen Share

Your video is not working

We are unable to access your camera.
...
```

### Expected Behavior

```markdown
1.
2.
3.
...
```

### Debug

```markdown
teams-for-linux --webDebug --logConfig='{}'
```

### Additional context

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/583f081e-8fc5-4e64-a041-495aa88f2446)
